alert.note: Alert for Canon City Vicinity, Eastern Fremont County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 18 at 3:32PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...Cluster of strong thunderstorms will impact portions of east central Fremont, south central El Paso and northwestern Pueblo Counties through 415 PM MDT... At 331 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a cluster of strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Fort Carson to 7 miles northeast of Penrose to near Canon City. Movement was southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Fountain, Pinon, Penrose and Pueblo West. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Canon City Vicinity, Eastern Fremont County
